name: Spiritfall (itch)
description:
The season of Spiritfall has come, and spirits are falling into the Ethereal Barrier Region like leaves from a tree. Play as Kali, still settling into the area with your partner Liv, and welcome spirits into your garden to see it flourish once again. 
But only some of the souls visiting you have good intentions - keep the rest of them out, or see your plants wither inside too.

Controls:
A + D to move
Mouse to select options/perform actions

Programming, Art & Narrative Design - Eloise Unerman (inkandamaranth)
Music & Sound Design - Nicholas Kumashov
Made in the last 8 days of Queer Undead Jam
